I was very, very pleased with this camera, all in all.  I would recommend this camera to someone looking for easy-to-use camera with some nice added features that you don't get in a cheap model.

Reviews.Title: Another excellent Panasonic from Amazon...
Reviews.Author: D Skopp
Reviews.Content: I have had three Panasonic digitals--my FZ5 from 2003 still works beautifully, but is too large to carry in my pocket and only works on a 1 mg SD car; I dropped my pocketable TZ5 and my LZ7 was lost in a snowbank until Spring.  So I bought this ZS8.  I am entirely satisfied; if I am careful--and I plan to be--I won't drop it or lose it in a snowbank.  Best features: 16x zoom; easy, fully intuitive and accessible controls; long-lived lithium, rechargeable battery; convenient size; video mode; excellent playback.  What I wish were even better:  sharper images (I'm not complaining; with a bit of tweaking on Picasa, almost every picture can become better, and I have taken many without any tweaking that are excellent); even more powerful flash.  At $190 when I bought it on Amazon.com, this camera was a great buy and serves me very well!

Reviews.Title: nice little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: George A. Dapsevicius "George D"
Reviews.Content: Great little pocket camera. I have a 5 year old lx2 and used the same sd card and the pictures taken with the dmc-zs8 are virtually identical. The real difference is that the display monitor of the zs8 is oustandingly superior. There in nothig wrong with the lx2 but the zx8 is easyer and much simpler to use. But I miss the RAW feature of the lx2. YOU REALLY DO GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT camera to consider!
Reviews.Author: J. M.
Reviews.Content: I was on a trip with friends in June and saw first hand the capability of this camera.  The zoom enables many photo ops that other "hand-held" cameras didn't offer to me before.  I was able to get pics in situations that I wouldn't have considered getting with my other cameras.The camera is light weight and fits in the shirt pocket easily, but it feels substantial, not cheap.  Good directions are provided.  I needed them to help locate how to use the MANY features that are available.  (For the first time, I successfully took pictures of last 4th of July fireworks!)  I'm now a believer in Panasonic products after being a Canon user for years.

Reviews.Title: Great Photos/Easy To Use Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Fudge "Ron"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that would let me take great photos but didn't require much knowledge about complicated cameras, I needed one that was also light to carry because of the amount of traveling that I do.  I've had good cameras before that have had so many functions that because of simplicity, I stuck to only using the basics of them.  (This camera fits all of the bills and at a very reasonable price with this seller who offers a good deal!)  Funny thing was, a month ago while on vacation touring Romania and the Baltics, not only a couple, but many people on my tour had Lumix cameras, this very model and some older models.  I really liked it and will purchase another one in the future.  If you are on the fence, give it a try.  I think the photos will prove your decision to be a very positive one.

Reviews.Title: Chamber of excellent quality and good price
Reviews.Author: TONI
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera where photos and videos taken by a tourist and become very easily amateur in a professional quality photos, simply knowing how to use all its excellent and easy to operate for the particular time and she plows the remaining work. I recommend it for its small size, powerful and very lightweight zoom lens for your leisure or just to have it at home and have memories of those special events to save. Sending this seller was very fast and safe, 100% recommended.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC ZS8
Reviews.Author: Al B.
Reviews.Content: As advertised and a great camera.  This is our 2nd Lumix and for the price point it's terrific.Highly recommend it for the average user that's looking for an excellent point and shoot with a few extra features, should you want to use them.  We find the stabilization feature one of the best on the market.  We choose Lumix again after reviewing everything out there in the product category.  Can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Loving this camera!
Reviews.Author: SChiasson
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. I went on to a butterfly house and the pictures of the butterflies came out gorgeous. The detail of each one was so amazing. I have larger, more expensive cameras, but this is the one I find myself going to more and more. It is especially great on walks and sightseeing as it is so light to carry. LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: D. E. Smith
Reviews.Content: Just love this camera.  It takes great pictures and the image stabilization feature helps a lot, particularly when taking photos using the zoom.  The zoom lens is great.  You can get in very close and indoor shots are very clear even without the flash.  Best digital camera I've ever bought.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: R. HOOVER "real life movie critic"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I am taking more and better photos than I ever have before. I haven't found anything negative to say about this camera yet. The only way to make it any better for would be to sell it cheaper. The HD video is stunningly good, easy to use and the zoom operates in HD movie mode. The big zoom allows me to get close, and the high resolution allows me use the editing software to zoom in even more with amazingly good results. Only a professional photographer could find this camera lacking. The battery life is very good, I have never come close to running the battery down.  If you want a camera that you can just power up and shoot, set this one to Intelligent Auto and start shooting. Even the auto timer works well. The menu system is easy to use. The video quality is better than any camcorder I have ever owned. This camera is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Joanie
Reviews.Content: Just came back from out west using our Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 camera for the first time.  The zoom quality was excellent & the camera was very easy to use.  We got great pictures.  The only negative thing I have to say is the problem with the sun glare on the screen.  It was impossible to see what you were filming.  Have ordered glare shields but haven't received yet.  Hope this solves the problem.  Other than that I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Shiva
Reviews.Content: All pictures taken in broad daylight comes perfect.  Pictures taken in dim light looses its sharpness if your hands shake a bit - in that way, I'm not sure whether the image stabilization is doing its best or not.  Anyways, I'm very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Sheila N. Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The pictures are clear, colors good and the size just right for my purse. I'm very pleased with it.Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)I bought the case Case Logic TBC-302 Ultra Compact Camera Case with Storage (Black) to protect the camera. It's a tight fit but does hold the camera. There is no room for anything else even though there's a side zipper. It serves the purpose of protecting the camera and for the price, not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera at a nice price
Reviews.Author: 124wave
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a trip to Rome. It took great pictures with a good zoom range and decent wide angle for scenes in the city. Worked well with night shots on the correct setting. The various settings were easy to understand after a few minutes since they are logically done The video feature seems to work well but I have not done much with that yet. The pictures that we printed were sharp and the small size makes it easy to carry. I still prefer a separate viewfinder for bright light but seems to be rare on any cameras in this price range. We are very satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for every day use
Reviews.Author: Tania "PareoVert"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for every day use. Can't beat the 14 MP and the 16x zoom! I usually use a SLR camera with various lenses, however with a new baby and the weight of the camera, I wanted something convenient and light. I haven't printed any pics yet but the quality on the screen looks great (compared to my professional Nikon camera).Since there is no manual focus, so you won't get perfect macro shots. Still, you can zoom in close enough to get decent details. I am mentioning this because I love shooting close up nature shots, which obviously are best with SLR and a macro lens.Update: I still love this camera, my toddler's portraits are of excellent quality. I did have an issue with spots on the lens, I mailed it to panasonic to be cleaned and they wanted to charge me 185$. Hubby found a video on YouTube showing how to clean the lens of that model (or very similar model), so we bought a tiny screw driver (at MarVac electronics) and a tiny 'dust blower air pump cleaner', tadaa !! Lens is clean again.

Reviews.Title: Dirt in lense, costs more to clean than the original cost of the camera
Reviews.Author: L. Hinrichsen
Reviews.Content: This camera was great for the first few months.  Right around six months after I bought the camera, I took it on vacation, and after an amazing day on a whale watching cruise, with (potentially) fantastic pics of a young orca, I was sickened to find that all my photos were ruined by black spots.  It turns out it is not uncommon for this particular model to pull debris in via the telescoping lens, even little dust particles from inside your camera bag, and it has to be opened up and cleaned.  I bought the camera for $149 and so far the best price for cleaning I've found is $160.  If you need a camera for something important, please do not take a chance on this camera.  It isn't worth it!  Update:  I followed the instructions on some youtube videos on how to open the camera and clean the sensor.  If you attempt this, be careful not to strip the screws! Don't mess with the screws unless you know you have the right size screwdriver, because if you strip the screws, the only thing you can do is drill them out.  I have a bad feeling that this camera is going into the trash.  But I'll keep trying until I have no more options.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: I'm a very frequent concert goer and I had been looking for a small point and shoot camera to use at concerts. I had been researching different ones for a while, but I finally bought this one back in May. I've been using it since then, been to 10+ concerts and this is an excellent camera; I would recommend it again and again. It's small enough to fit in your back pocket, there are tons of different settings that can be used, HD video, the quality of my pictures and videos are fantastic, sound distortion in the videos very rarely occurs, colors are vibrant, and zoom for both picture and video is out of this world. I'm also really impressed with the battery life.. If my battery is fully charged before I go to a concert, it still has quite a bit of juice left even after taking a good amount of pictures and video. Not only have I used it at concerts, but I've used it a few times for taking pictures outdoors. Once again, fantastic quality pictures. Not only is it great at all the things listed above, but it's also super easy to use. Buy this camera and you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Excellent compact
Reviews.Author: Claude
Reviews.Content: I have owned a lumix previously and was very happy with it.  This is just better!  One note - you can zoom in and out when taking video with this one.  The range of the lens is great - pictures are great for a camera this size.

Reviews.Title: Easy to take photos
Reviews.Author: gvguru
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a few months.  Takes excellent photos.  Many settings for a camera of this type.  Light weight and easy to hold.  down side is there is no view finder.  Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: A lot of features and good pictures but a few hiccups
Reviews.Author: Nicolas
Reviews.Content: I was the happy owner of the precent model called TZ8 in Europe (while this one would be the TZ18) but I had to replace it because dust had collected inside the lenses and black dots where appearing on every pictures. So far I found everything I liked from the precious version plus a few more useless stuff and a more durable battery.The good point is that its autonomy is VERY long. In Yellowstone National Park, I probably took a good 700-800 pictures before it died off, which is remarkable (also, the batteries from the previous model are compatible). It's also very easy to use and quite faster than the previous generation. It does quite a good job both as a point and shoot and as a SLR-like with its manual mode, like extended expositions and a tripod (I took some awesome pictures of lightning bolts very easily with it).On the other side, I also see a few small things I don't like about this model. First, the iA mode (fully automatic) is often really off balance, and by that I mean that it doesn't convey something that looks natural. Often, everything is too bright or too dark and the colors are either de-saturated of too contrasted. Either way, it's not very handy to use because you often have to try multiple shots at different variations of contrast to get the best picture or aim for the sky and lower your aim while maintaining the focus to get more crisp colors. It still does a decent job, but I kinda prefer to use it in full manual mode to get what I need.Second, pictures are more often blurry or poorly sharpened using this model than the previous one. I often get some bad artefacts and post-processing glitches... nothing that can't be eased out by resizing the picture down and sharpening it a bit, but it still bothers me a bit.Finally, what REALLY bothers me about this camera is the same as with its predecessor: the lenses/objective/zoom is NOT SEALED or AIR TIGHT at all! Which means that dust can and will easily collect inside the lenses and make all your future pictures bad. After one week of extensive (more than 5000 pictures) but careful use (putting it back in its little bag after every use) in a dusty environment (desert of Arizona and Utah), dust had already collected in the lenses. This is very unfortunate and can happen after one single mistake. Mine was to let it turned on a few minutes while hiking (which means with the lenses exposed). I usually ALWAYS and CONSTANTLY turn it off after I take a picture to avoid this situation, but I forgot once and got bitten immediately.So yes, all in all a very good camera, but it had its flaws, as minor as they might be.

Reviews.Title: best camera for your money
Reviews.Author: David Jenison "davidjenison"
Reviews.Content: i love the Lumix with the leica lens. This is my second one. Love the added features on this one, notably faster high speed burst and better zoom. Good point and shoot and highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: FAILED AFTER 147 PICTURES
Reviews.Author: David A Nugent
Reviews.Content: DO NOT EVER BUY AN EXTENDED WARRANTY AT BEST BUY!!!!I purchased a Panasonic Luminx DMC-ZS8 in July 2010. In Aug. 2011 the camera failed after 147 pictures in 13 months. (An internal software program designed to require use of Panosonic Brand Batteries Only, would not recognize its own battery.) Under the extended warranty program BEST BUY sent the camera for repair twice. This took over 60 days. On the last return, they said the camera was unrepairable and they would give me a store credit to purchase another camera. I HAD NO CHOICE! The $80 I had paid for an extended warranty was no longer valid after they gave me a store credit. A loss of 3years warranty or $60. The store credit was for $149.00 for a camera that I paid $299 for AN ADDITIONAL LOSS OF $150.SUMMARY: I PAID $380 FOR A WORTHLESS CAMERA THAT BEST BUY'S WARRANTY RETURNED $149 ON. A LOSS OF $231.I WILL NEVER PURCHASE AT BEST BUY AGAIN

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Zenmom607
Reviews.Content: FIrst of all..... I am a mom, not a photographer.  I do not want to read manuals and adjust the settings on my camera every time I move location to get the optimal shot.  I just wanted a camera to take great pictures and video of my kiddos in action.  After hours of reading product reviews, I bought the Canon PowerShot 3300.  2 weeks later it went back to Best Buy.  The Canon did take great video, but the pictures were very disappointing.  If there was the slightest bit of motion in my subject, the picture was blurry.  And if my kids did happen to be sitting still, picture quality still not that great.  So I read some more reviews and chose the Panasonic Lumix DMC-Zs8.  I love my new camera.  Video is outstanding, you can zoom in/out while in video mode.  And the picture quality is outstanding.  I have only used the iA mode, i don't really see the need for the others.  The camera does a wonderful job of adjusting to the lighting, I've taken pics indoors in low light and outside in the glaring snow, both situations resulted in great pics.  Ive probably taken 100 pics and 7 mins of video, and the battery is still going strong.  I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Worked for maybe 20 pictures
Reviews.Author: fannbea6
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a Christmas gift, and it was used maybe twice before it stopped working. I thought it may be a battery issue, but I ordered a replacement battery and charger and it still doesn't work. My best friend had an earlier model of the same camera, and she's had it for a few years with no problems, which is why I chose the Lumix. I didn't realize until it was out of warranty that it wasn't just a battery, so now I guess I'm just out of luck for this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: J. S. Ewing "Jack"
Reviews.Content: Every 6 months or so the camera needs to be completely disassembled to clean the inner lens. This represents a design flaw in my opinion and Panasonic should recall this camera and provide replacements.

Reviews.Title: not the best picture quality
Reviews.Author: Steve Krebs
Reviews.Content: Though the features are amazing and the camera is very easy to navigate, the picture quality leaves a little to be desired.  The only area where it excels is Macro.  I had an older 10X lumix that hands down took better pictures.  Perhaps making a lens this compact AND 16X is a little much to ask.

Reviews.Title: This is the one
Reviews.Author: wß
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good point-and-shoot camera look no further. I can't speak for the longterm reliablity, as I haven't owned it for long, but for this price it takes outstanding pictures.

Reviews.Title: better than my other one.
Reviews.Author: alexis
Reviews.Content: The zoom is great, there's a little "noise" on some pictures, things can be washed out, it takes great action shots, sometime it's slow, it takes great indoor shots, kinda bulky, but light and records videos in HD.. with all that.. it could just be me, it's new so I'm not all the way sure how to work the darn thing. But it's better than the other camera, same brand, I had.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera for a second time
Reviews.Author: Treesh
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have purchased this camera (I might have had the previous model the first time around, I swear this one is identical, but maybe a bit lighter than I remember).  I had the first one for a couple of years and loved it.  It takes awesome, crisp pictures and packs a lot of features into a nice pocket size.  My cat knocked the camera off of the top of my bookcase, cracking the screen.  It IS a durable camera, as I had dropped it a few times myself.  But the 6 foot fall onto a hard wood floor was the death of it.  Can't really blame the camera (stupid cat).I went searching for a new digital and after hours of research and reading user reviews, I bought the Lumix again.  Only at a much lower price.  I thought this camera was a great buy when I spent almost $300.00 on it years ago.  At the $180.00 I just spent on it the second time around - it's a steal!An early Christmas gift to myself.  Can't wait to put this thing to use over the holidays.--- Update - I have been snapping pictures for about a week now.  I love this camera.  I got some great shots of my lightning-fast 2 year old nephew running around in front of our Christmas tree.  Bad lighting, christmas tree lights blinking, and the TV glowing as he runs by, and the shots are still gorgeous.  Great color, so sharp.  I am no professional photographer, and I don't need to be with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Best point and shoot ever!
Reviews.Author: JoEri "woodswoman"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement of another Lumix camera.  Loved it so much that I wanted another one.  I use this all the time--much better than my VERY expensive digital SLR and the quality is outstanding!

Reviews.Title: Lousy tech support
Reviews.Author: Tina from Brooklyn "Piedmont photobug"
Reviews.Content: The camera is ok but the one star is for the terrible Panasonic tech support.  First the printed manual is eliminated and then when I email for a problem answer I am told to call an 800 number.  I call the 800 number I am told I would have to pay $7.00 for an answer.  So, buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Spots on your photos taken at night time
Reviews.Author: Raymond's_musing
Reviews.Content: Its true about the other reviews about the spots on photos taken during dark places.  I used this camera on halloween, for some reason there were spots in my photo.  During daylight or situations where there is ample light, I don't see it.  I am afraid about the comments of other users regarding dusts entering the lens.  (which spells major $$$$ in repair).The camera is easy to carry around.  The battery has long life.  I took it to San Diego, and have 300 + pictures and its still in full bar.  ( its that good!).  The picture quality,  on various settings I played around can be summarized as soft.  I wish it was sharper. Auto bracketing is slow too.Even if it feels like a quality camera when holding, the bottom line for me is always the image.  The spots and dust issue is disturbing and it means I will retire this camera when it becomes unbearable.

Reviews.Title: Great budget camera
Reviews.Author: C. Gensheimer
Reviews.Content: This camera is our favorite. It's rugged enough to take everywhere and the 16x zoom really helps in distance travel situations. Photo quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Standing By
Reviews.Author: Todd Wynn
Reviews.Content: We use our digital camera a plenty in this facility. This purchase is a standby replacement. We are very pleased with the quality of the photos we receive from our current camera. Unfortunately, so many people handle this camera ( dirty hands and all ), that we have to have a back-up for just in case someone drops the main camera.

Reviews.Title: dust / lint in lens
Reviews.Author: MeanyFellini
Reviews.Content: after about a year (warranty expiration) my camera is useless due to lint in the lens or sensor.  No warranty left, I'm sure the cost of repair will be prohibitive.  Thinking of tearing into it myself.  If you google this problem, you'll see that many many people have the same issue with this camera and other "compact" Panasonics.  They say the Canon is best for this issue.

Reviews.Title: Not Really Impressed
Reviews.Author: Matilda
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera to record memories for my grandsons' scrapbooks.  I looked for something easy to use as I'm not a very good photographer.  I wanted something that would adjust for different lighting; would have a zoom that would allow pictures to be taken on a school stage or a football field; and a quick shutter that would capture those basketball and soccer moments.  This camera is okay with different lighting if you can give it enough time to focus.  Any movement at all blurs the picture.  The zoom is just adequate.  Red eyes are a real problem.  All in all I've had it for a few years and I'm still using it but it's just adequate--really not what I was hoping for.

Reviews.Title: Worked fine for 2 years - then it happened.
Reviews.Author: M. Wingate
Reviews.Content: Liked the camera for the most part for almost 2 years. Then started seeing fuzzy spots on the pictures. From doing some research found out that the ZS-8 is known to get dust inside the camera which makes spots on the pictures.  To fix the camera, one would have to send it back to Panasonic to have cleaned and that would cost almost as much as the camera. Since this is a on going problem with this model not worth fixing.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This!
Reviews.Author: Ken Wahlstrom
Reviews.Content: Ironically this faulty item was recommended by my Digital Photography professor. When I turned on the camera the OIS (Optical Image Stabilization) message continues to come on and rather than allowing you to set it, does not allow you to use the camera. After reading on line that other people had the same problem and were not able to correct it. I decided not to waste any more time or money trying to fix it. This is not the only negative Amazon review of this product. Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: best compact camera I ever owned we have 3 of them
Reviews.Author: shore times
Reviews.Content: best compact camera I ever owned we have 3 of them - rugged, user friendly, full featured and uses SD cards which in class 10 absolutely rock ... both pictures and videos are excellent - I can't say enough good things about this model from Panasonic - buy it you too will love it

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Graywolfnine
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality.  Takes wonderful pictures.  Used the camera on numerous outings:  Ireland, JMT, horseback riding, camping, canoeing, etc.  The ease of use and and zoom make all the difference.

Reviews.Title: Ok.
Reviews.Author: Kayhold
Reviews.Content: This camera worked great for the first 2 weeks, then it got dust inside it. It eventually quit working all together after a short while, giving me an Auto Focus Error.

Reviews.Title: Great everyday camera.
Reviews.Author: Brian Unwin
Reviews.Content: Simple enough to use by even the most digitally challenged.  Takes the best photos.  Able to hold a long charge.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: An Amazing Camera!!! It takes great pictures and amazing video! I love my camera it was just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Samuel L. Straight
Reviews.Content: This is the second Panasonic I've had.  Great camera with a multitude of settings and advantages.  The picture quality is exceptional, and the telephoto aspects are super

Reviews.Title: thank you!!
Reviews.Author: Godwin Mindra
Reviews.Content: Thank you for delivering this product. I like it and works just fine. Will for sure come back to shop

Reviews.Title: Versatile and Functional Superzoom
Reviews.Author: A. Duncan
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera, one of the better point-and-shoot cameras we have owned.  It's superzoom capabilities give it an edge over comparable cameras.  Some features worth pointing out:-The Leica lens is quite good.  Not as good as the Panasonic promotional materials may imply, but zooming in on birds or other objects at a distance is possible and produces reasonably good images.  As with many point-and-shoots, it will not produce an image with as much color saturation, detail and depth as a good SLR.  In some situations an iPhone has produced just as good an image, but usually the Panasonic wins out.-The chargeable lithium battery is excellent.  Not only does the battery hold an impressive charge, but chargers and additional batteries are available at a reasonable price.-Features are good:  good automatic mode, plenty of scene modes and manual modes, serviceable image stabilization, a reasonably good flash, a clear imaging screen, good video capabilities, good on-screen feedback, etc.-Build quality and durability are good.  We have used it for several years, and it is holding up well.There are no major defects with this camera, and it is reasonably priced for its features.I would have preferred to have a more prominent hand-grip, and less slippery surface, but that is a minor gripe.

Reviews.Title: Good with a caveat
Reviews.Author: Henry Jankiewicz
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. However, BE WARNED, the zoom mechanism, as I understand it, has a tendency to admit or suck in dust that mars the exposures, which means the camera has to be disassembled and cleaned (an expensive proposition--but there are some DIY instructions on YouTube). This has happened to any number of people, including myself and a friend. Still, I love the camera, so be very careful; get a case and don't zoom while you're pointing out the car window.

Reviews.Title: Great camera decent price
Reviews.Author: Mothership
Reviews.Content: My first Panasonic Lumix DMC-Zs8 camera broke (accident) and I immediately went to find another. Best Buy said they don't have them anymore, so bought this one from Amazon. Takes great photos, excellent close ups, even though I am not a skilled photographer. I hope Panasonic starts making these again, because it is the best camera ever!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE OF THE DUST
Reviews.Author: roofman19
Reviews.Content: While I was initially pleased with this camera, the problem of dust infiltration has definitely tarnished my experience.Apparently it has been well documented that dust infiltrates the system and lodges on the sensor. The dust then appears as dark spots on your image, effectively spoiling all of your photographs.Cleaning the sensor is far beyond the capabilities of most average photo hobbyists.So, now you will wind up spending a few hundred dollars to purchase a camera & then will need to spend more than  $100 every time it requires cleaning.PANASONIC has always been my "go to" brand; but I can NOT recommend this camera to anyone.BUYER BEWARE!!Since first posting this review, I have corresponded with Panasonic Investor Relations and Customer Support.  Panasonic apparently refuses to acknowledge that there is a problem with this camera's design, despite many similar complaints. My camera developed the "floater" issue after about 15 months of moderate use.Panasonic has advised me that the camera is no longer eligible for warranty service and has recommended that I ship it to their repair facility for inspection & repair. Cost Estimate $ 180 !!!!!!Sounds time to simply by a different camera.  Very disappointed that Panasonic would neither back their product nor acknowledge long term brand loyalty!!!!!SURPRISE!!  SURPRISE!!!!  PANASONIC now offers repairs at half cost or discounted price on purchase of a new camera.  I acknowledge their efforts at extending this offer.

Reviews.Title: This camera is a true workhorse
Reviews.Author: Linda Hepburn
Reviews.Content: Great for if you want to take pictures at dusk that look as if taken in broad daylight. If you take lots of pictures every day it's metal case stands up to a lot of abuse. This is my second one. The first one still works but I had to use it in the rain so much (constantly drying it off) that eventually water got in the zoom lens causing spots. This is not advertised as a water proof camera. The zoom is amazing! It is fast and stable. I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Travel Camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas M. Ingram "Pup"
Reviews.Content: This camera has traveled to Africa and another rip to China. I have carried it in a belt-attached carrier. In Africa it spent 10 days in the bush on a hunt. My pictures were beautiful, much better than our PH with a high-end Nikon. In China it survived the Great Wall, Shanghai and Xi'an. I have abandoned my Sony digital A-1000 and all my heavy Minolta lens because this little camera just takes better pics. My 8 lens each cost much more than the cost of this little jewel, plus I am not carrying 60 pounds of camera gear. I have not had the problem of dust, probably because I do not carry it in my pocket.. Read the manual and learn how to use this camera and you can take beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: I love this little camera.  great quality.
Reviews.Author: john francisco
Reviews.Content: great camera.  it is super for a small camera.  I would buy it again if need be!  It takes very clear photos.  JOHN

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: spellcheck
Reviews.Content: Like the size and the power; wish it had a few more manual controls.I wish the lens retracted after switching from camera use to 'view' mode without having to turn the whole thing off first. For a pocket P+S this is a dandy!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Karen Moist Page
Reviews.Content: I was really nervous that there would be something wrong with t, it was such a good deal, but it is in perfect condition!  I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kaye
Reviews.Content: Excellent small camera. Takes a great picture.  However, it gets dirt on the sensor easily, so have to had it cleaned multiple times.

Reviews.Title: Lumix DMC ZS-1 Unfortunately Short Life
Reviews.Author: Kenneth D. Mcgregor Jr.
Reviews.Content: The camera performed beautifully, very versatile, capable and easy to use. However, it lasted barely longer than a year. Beware! (The warranty is one year)

Reviews.Title: Didn't Last Long Before Issues
Reviews.Author: G. Meyer
Reviews.Content: This camera was very good for the first few months.  Then I noticed a black shadow in the corners especially when taking photographs with the flash indoors.  Then, the retractable lens started sticking and I would have to manually push it open.  The part that takes the cake, and makes me convinced Panasonic isn't serious about quality anymore, is when black specs of dirt and lint got into the lens and now all pictures are worthless because these black specs show up everywhere.  If you are a neat freak, keep the camera in a lint free cases, and never travel anywhere then this is the camera for you.  In less than 1 year I am looking for a new camera.  Thanks but no thanks Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Lumix DMC-ZS8
Reviews.Author: Mihai Marin
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. My favorite part of it is the zoom+stability control capability. The interface is pretty good. It doesn't have as many cool options as other cameras like picking just one color to stand out in pictures but it has a bunch to choose from. The picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Milan
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement of the same camera I had before.  It works fine and I can use batteries and cables I had from the original.

Reviews.Title: Fan of the Panasonic Lumix series
Reviews.Author: Bitey (the big one)
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and take a ridiculous number of pics. I love the Panasonic Lumix cameras. They are easy to tote about, comfortably fitting in my hand as I wander around. They have a great zoom, which I love for wildlife, and give really high quality pics for a point and shoot. I've documented about 20 international trips with a few of these and have been super happy. In fact, even with my Canon Rebel T3i, I always carry this too. It's so convenient. I like to take it on runs through cities, which has been a great way to see cities and get exercise. The intelligent system works great. And they take pretty decent night-time shots, which is important to me. Overall, this is a great camera for basically any situation. I've had these for years now, so can't directly compare to anything else that isn't like 10 years old.Also, they're hardy. I've dropped and banged up a number of these and they take a beating. And when they stop, I've always had great interactions with the Panasonic customer service. No issues replacing when under warranty.

Reviews.Title: Its a good backup point and shoot to carry.
Reviews.Author: krbowman
Reviews.Content: We carry in car for extra camera and just in case your camera is not available or no phone.  Small and compact with great features

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and easy to operate
Reviews.Author: Sarah Palmer
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera and takes great photos.  Very easy to operate with simple instructions.. I would recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ksenia
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's easy to use and has all necessary functions. The photos are rather good, the video is very high quality, It meets all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-Zs8
Reviews.Author: ed jones
Reviews.Content: This camera has many features.  I've only had it less than a month and have not had a chance to figure all of them out.  It has a feature that gives you a good picture even if the camera is not held perfectly still.  This is great for us old folks.  The zoom power is amazing.  I have taken pictures from 50 yards away that make it look like I was standing nearby.  There are so many features that you do have to spend some time reading the manual (from a CD) and working with it.  I believe the effort will be worth it in the end.  The camera is slightly bigger than I would have liked.  However, it still fits in my pants pocket and in a small case I bought for it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, but confusing
Reviews.Author: JBiz
Reviews.Content: Overall, I think I'm very pleased with this camera. It was a gift, and 2 years later, I've still had no issues so far with performance. That being said, I'm not a novice camera user, and I've had my share of experience with various products.This camera has by far the ABSOLUTE worst user manual I've ever had the displeasure of reading. As I said, 2 years later, there are still features I can't access, and after poring over the accompanied CD guide, the directions are unclear and seem to attempt to "demonstrate" things without actually demonstrating them. I'm sure there are those who would have a lot better luck than me, but seriously Panasonic? At least try to make it user friendly--both the camera's interface and the manual.Would have been a 4, but the manual thing has just frustrated me to no end.

Reviews.Title: Very good image for price
Reviews.Author: Diana Martinez
Reviews.Content: only think i didn't like was the panoramic pic function was better in older models but everything else is very good.

Reviews.Title: Good price point
Reviews.Author: Robin Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my college age daughter.  The price point is great and it takes very nice pictures

Reviews.Title: LOW LIGHT AND CONCERT SHOTS NOT PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Eve Holmes
Reviews.Content: Still not getting the low light and concert stage photos I really need, for I am an entertainer.  Been fooling around with several settings and still not what I wanted the camera for.  I now own 4 cameras..Canon, Kodak, Nikon and Panasonic (plus the camera on my phone).  It does real nice photos and it is more stable than the Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Takes nice pics
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Lacasella
Reviews.Content: Nice camera takes nice pics. However you cannot shoot the pic too fast otherwise the lighting will be off; subject will look faded  when using flash. . Just have to get into the habit of pushing the button slowly.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Steve "JackOfAllTrades"
Reviews.Content: This Panasonic Lumix camera works great.  Easy to use with lots of features.  Zoom works great and the camera takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price and features
Reviews.Author: Got Here As Soon As I Could
Reviews.Content: Bought this because my old camera was a pain in the a-- when you pushed the button to take the picture there is a too long delay before it snapped off the picture .Have to admit that I leave it in auto mode but that is good for me also like the zoom lense to pick out how to frame my picture(s)

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Aniruddha Agashe
Reviews.Content: Excellent wide angle and great zoom. Excellent camera to have. No complaints what so ever. Gr.eat product range from Panasonic

Reviews.Title: Great video recording
Reviews.Author: Eric W "ewannama"
Reviews.Content: This replaced our old Lumix, and we would buy another.  This one does feel a bit lighter (thinner shelled) than one from ~ 2007, but has thankfully survived a few clumsy falls.Battery life is excellent and loads of pictures and videos will fit on 8GB card.Capable of good pictures with a steady hand and proper lighting.  Pretty quick for point and shoot, but flash can delay shots, causing you to miss smiles or other action.  Incredible zoom and more modes than we use.  Obviously not capable of instant or rapid shots like an SLR.Best feature is excellent sound and video recording.  Great capacity for clear high definition videos < 10 minutes long, which we can then slice and dice on computer.  We have toddlers and do not need a separate video camera to capture the times.  Also recorded some family music for grandparents and sound quality surpasses computer sound recorder.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves this camera
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Works well for the point and shoot person. Does nicely in low light and is light weight, small and quiet.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Denise Reider
Reviews.Content: I had several other cameras, sold them all and bought this one. I have not used it a lot, but have taken lots of photos of birds eating from my feeders out the kitchen window and the zoom is wonderful. I want to learn how to use all the features it offers someday.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of Panasonic and have 3 of their cameras. I used to have 4 but my daughter fell in love with this one and adopted it. Although it's a bit large for a shirt pocket, it has an incredible (wide angle/telescopic) range and produces nice clear pics. Lots of features but works just fine on the automatic setting.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dana Elliott
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  Great camera, easy to use, awesome pictures!  The price was amazing, much cheaper than Best Buy!

Reviews.Title: A Better Panasonic Lumix Digital Camera !
Reviews.Author: Francisco Alba "Wizard"
Reviews.Content: A Better Panasonic Lumix Digital Camera !The Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 is a very good camera. The new camera has great new features.This new features can help you take better pictures! This optical zooom gives you highly natural expressions from people and animals that you can't get close to. The camera can be used to film movies.It is designed to suppress noise while zooming.The camera features a 3.0-inch, 230,000-dot High-resolution LCD.The DMC-ZS8 is equipped with a 3.0-inch LCD . Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: rkt
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for my amateur photos. Many good features to explore and test out. Haven't blown up any photos into 16x20 or greater, but so far all standard sizes are good.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: PatWise "PatWise"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this one for my Husband last Christmas. I already have one, and like it so well I was sure he would also. Great pic's, love the lens. Zooms out to get far away items.

Reviews.Title: Great All-Around Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Brock
Reviews.Content: Modest price. Easy to use. Great quality. Perfect for me. -- 10 more words required -- 10 more words required.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Wary one
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a cheaper camera and save $100.00, but on a friends recommendation I went ahead and got this for a recent trip to Central America. Excellent picture quality, great setting selections and very easy to use. Fast activation from turn on to shutter release. Can be used with one hand to turn on and reach shutter button. Very nice bright viewfinder. The larger than most Leica lens is extremely sharp throughout the zoom range. Image stabilization allowed me to get the monkey in the tree, full frame and no motion blur. Plus it's small enough to carry in a pant pocket.I'd recommend it to any level user, from a point and shooter through a pro who wants full control of exposure settings

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Bryon
Reviews.Content: Great camera for this price not only that the zoom is super but the video qaulity is wayyyy better than alot of other cameras out there I really have no complains.Me and my girlfriend take pictures of our son and your able to keep track of his age with each shot very cool feature I liked on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Alanna Tibbetts
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love this camera. It takes amazing and clear pictures and is so easy to use. The BEST camera we have ever owned. We love that it is small but still takes pictures like a big expensive camera would. Such a great product.

Reviews.Title: calidad
Reviews.Author: evelio jacinto medina torres
Reviews.Content: total confianza y satisfacción el un producto de excelente calidad el tiempo de entrega fue muy breve y estoy muy contento

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: merle somers
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I want a camera to do.  I'm a casual camera user, but I get great shots and in particular, good shots from a moving car!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mary Elizabeth Claywell
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased especially for 2 international trips that we had planned including one that is a Safari. We are looking forward to getting great shots of Africa with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for this price!
Reviews.Author: Carlos A. Mota
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the price. Takes excellent quality photos in all lighting conditions. Very easy to use menu. Pretty decent optical and digital zoom. Outstanding macro mode.

Reviews.Title: An excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Frazier
Reviews.Content: I always carry a small camera in my purse for those times when an unexpected opportunity happens.  I bought this one as a replacement for an earlier panasonic, but I have also had a Nikon Coolpix and a Canon elph.This camera is totally amazing.  The clarity of the images, the speed, the telephoto and close-up functions are beyond reproach.  I would very highly recommend this camera to anyone wanting a small, convenient travel camera.  The battery is long lived and not expensive, so I always have a second at the ready.  I find myself using this camera even more often than my DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Atlanta housewife
Reviews.Content: I have chosen this camera, because I already had a Panasonic DMC-ZR1, which made very good pictures, but got some dust/dirt into the lens. The lens shutter of the new ZS8 stopped opening/closing properly just after 2 weeks. Returned it to the seller and got reimbursed promptly. I will give an another try with the Panasonic ZS19. The big plus is, all this models have the same battery and loading socket.

Reviews.Title: Just want she wanted
Reviews.Author: K. Geisinger
Reviews.Content: Xmas gift for my wife and it was exactly what she wanted.  Compact, but with a good wide angle zoom.  Easy to use and easy to get the pictures on her computer.  She likes it so I like it.

Reviews.Title: Good fast camera
Reviews.Author: P. Williams
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a fast camera, we had enough shots of where something "had been" or the backs of people's heads.  This has WAY too many functions for me to figure out, but it has an intelligent auto that works great and the fast focus gets the pictures we used to miss.  Also using high speed memory which seems to be a must-have.

Reviews.Title: I lost my first Lumix and bought it again on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Dona A. Monroe
Reviews.Content: Oh Lordy, lord......I was soooooo upset when I could not find my camera.  I take lots of pictures every week.  So I bought the next model up that had come out since my original purchase.  As with the first camera, I am VERY pleased with this one.  It has many features that I have not used yet but I like knowing they are there is I need them.  I LOVE the large image viewer and the camera is very light weight and easy to hold for someone like me with small arthritic hands.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: S. Ramos "cinnamonfeathers"
Reviews.Content: Camera is perfect! (Got this for my husband) He used it during a hunting trip and although it wasn't a very successful hunt, from his tree-stand he did get a great zoomed in picture of a bright red cardinal foraging for food in a sea of brown leaves.... We would definitely recommend this camera! (definitely makes me want to replace my not so old camera with a Panasonic!)

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This camera has been amazing.  The wide angle is exceptional.  People who are professional photographers have even been grudgingly impressed with the wide angle capability of this camera.  The video is nice quality as well.  I have used this camera for two years, and love it.  Lots of manual settings to experiment with, and good automatic settings as well.  The zoom is very nice as well, and the quick zoom button is a cool feature.  Decent performance in low light.  Highly recommend for a point and shoot, or for someone who wants to use more manual settings.  Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: great camera. does everything I expected. very good quality. would recommend this product to anyone. I know several people that have it also.

Reviews.Title: Excelent choice
Reviews.Author: Casandra
Reviews.Content: Excelent choice. Totaly recommended. It is a very good camera, grate zoom and pixeles. Practice to carry and it take the pictures fast.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16 x Wide Angle
Reviews.Author: Janis Tenderholt
Reviews.Content: This is in my purse at all times and takes the best photos.So convenient and perfect size.  It is the easiest small camera to take on hikes, etc.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Took great pictures through a long and extensive trip through China and have enjoyed the photos enormously ever since (as have numerous friends and acquaintances).

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Eileen M. Stephenson
Reviews.Content: great pictures and it's a snap to operate, you don't need to be a genius.  the pictures are quality.  i upgraded from the kodak easy share to this one, glad i did.  much better pictures.

Reviews.Content: Great zoom lens. Ease of use. Good quality of photos.  A clearer instruction manual would be nice but that seems to be the way it is now days

Reviews.Title: Great Camer
Reviews.Author: Bonita Balla
Reviews.Content: After reading enough camera descriptions to blurr my vision, I decided on this Panasonic.  The size isperfect to fit in my purse, so I will always have a camera when all of "those great shots" that grandkids present.  The pictures are of good qualityalso.  What else could I say....great choice

Reviews.Title: Good Camera

Reviews.Content: I bought an older version 7 yrs ago and loved how it worked and how it lasted so much I bought this for my parents for Christmas. It takes great pictures and is very easy to use. The battery lasts forever and charges quickly when needed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing and as far as I am concerned was new. My boyfriend and I just love it and use it at all family and sports events. It works great!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, Should have gotten the next model up.
Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything a camera needs to do. It takes good pictures for the price. If you're looking for a higher quality camera... Get a DSLR. The zoom on this camera is perfect. I mean it can always zoom more but any real photographer knows if you can get closer... Do that. Also it has good features. Like I can change the ISO and the F stop. Honestly for me I really just use auto but my girlfriend is a photographer so using auto is not an option. I love the fact that I can hold the shutter button and it shows what the image will look like. Its pretty fast too. Also remember speed also comes from how fast your memory card is. If you have a slow memory card, the camera will be slow too. Another plus is that it can use a 64 gig memory card. You may ask why in the world would you need that big of a memory card... Well I went to Niagara Falls with this camera and if I didn't have a computer I would have had one day of pictures... So if you don't have access to a computer than you want the most storage as possible. And while I'm on the topic of Niagara Falls... This camera got wet from the falls. And I'm not talking about dunked in water or one drop. It got pretty wet. I was worried the water would get into the lenses but it didn't. Everything still works. I wouldn't recommend doing that too much but the great pictures I got were totally worth risking the camera. (SD cards wont be affected by water as long as they are not being read or written to when it gets wet, some SD cards are even waterproof)Depending on where you buy it this camera can be an amazing deal. I got it at Sam's club and it came with a 4 gig sd card. For free that's not too bad. And Sam's club has better customer service so all the issues you people are having with returns... Sam's club is better.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with this camera.  Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: mvreal5
Reviews.Content: I am not a pro.  Just an amateur who likes to take candid pictures. I've owned this Lumix DMC ZS8 camera for bout 10 months now.  I have taken hundreds of pictures(graduations, cruise, soccer games, indoors and outdoors, various lighting) and am extremely satisfied with this "point and shoot" camera.  Great zoom.  Great HD video. Great close-up pictures. Sharp pictures.  Have also taken pictures of my son's soccer games with great results(although the shutter burst was not as fast as my Nikon d5000).  I was contemplating on buying an expensive 18-300 lens for my DSLR but now use the Lumix SZ8 to take zoom pictures, and have kept my standard 18-55 on my Nikon D5000 for closer pictures.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMCZS8
Reviews.Author: Joy Skowronski
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son and my older son saw the great features so I bought exactly the same one again.  Great features and great price.  very happy with this camera and would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great for Outdoors, but not for low light/indoors or action shots
Reviews.Author: Cynthia L. Rosa
Reviews.Content: This small camera offers a lot for its size. The zoom is good, but would love to see one with 40x optical.My photo gallery of pics taken with this camera can be found here:[...]Positive things:Lightweight & great zoom for size, just would love more magnification and quicker auto focus ability.Auto mode and image stabilizer are awesome.Outdoor photos in daylight have very good qualityVideo quality is decent outdoors/daylightBattery Life is excellent.I only have 4 complaints about this camera.1. The low light/night/indoor photos/video are HORRIBLY GRAINY and the image quality thus sucks.2. Dust and such get inside the lens easily and then cause spots on the photos.3. The price is too high for how it performs..i.e. action shots.4. No Burst setting for pics.Thought this camera is capable of taking action shots, most of them are not clear or of decent quality to use. Once in a while, you might get a great one, but its like once every 50 shots.While I love the size of this camera, I don't think I'd buy another Panasonic unless they fix the noise in low light images and improve the action shot capabilities.Also, they need to improve the sharpness and speed of auto focus.

Reviews.Title: excellent small bag camera
Reviews.Author: johno95
Reviews.Content: stylish, lacks features of subsequent future models, but i didn't need those features, and didn't want to pay for them.

Reviews.Title: I like the camera.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my camera. It was a very good value.  When I first got it I took it on a cruise and the pictures turned out very well.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS8 14.1 MP digital Camera
Reviews.Author: jbornhorn
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love this camera.  It is so easy to use, pretty much point & shoot and the results are super.  It is small and light weight so I can drop it in my purse and not be weighed down. I really like the wide angle lens.  I mainly use the camera to take pictures of properties that we have listed for sale and upload the pics to the various web sites on the internet.  This is one of the best cameras I have found that serves my purpose.

Reviews.Title: Best small camera I've used yet.
Reviews.Author: P. Poland
Reviews.Content: This little camera's wide angle lense includes much more than most small cameras I've seen, and the picture color is vivid and appears near true.  Really like.

Reviews.Title: great little camera

Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  It takes great pictures, zoom works great and has numberous settings to work with.  Battery takes a good charge and lasts.  The only down side is it is tough to take multiple shots.  Takes a few seconds in between shots to reset.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional camera
